content: A dissent Thursday by Chief Justice Leo Strine of the Delaware Supreme Court has no practical consequences whatsoever. In The Williams Companies v. Energy Transfer Equity  Strine’s Supreme Court colleagues affirmed a Chancery Court ruling that allowed ETE to walk away from a $20 billion agreement to acquire Williams because ETE’s tax lawyers at Latham & Watkins declined in good faith to issue a tax opinion required in the merger agreement. The majority ruling means the deal is dead. ETE wins. La
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Delaware Chief Justice Strine writes cautionary tale for deal lawyers

content: Sept 11 Spectra Energy Corp has exited the auction process for rival pipeline company The Williams Companies Inc  raising the possibility that Energy Transfer Equity LP could succeed in buying the company  people familiar with the discussions said.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Spectra exits Williams Cos' auction  ETE remains -sources

content: Aug 24 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Monday:
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Pipeline company Energy Transfer Equity LP  is bidding for Magnum Hunter Resources Corp's  stake in natural gas gathering unit Eureka Hunter Holdings  Bloomberg reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Energy Transfer bidding for Magnum Hunter stake in pipeline unit: Bloomberg

content: Energy Transfer Equity LP  has progressed to the second round of bidding for Williams Companies   according to people familiar with the matter  a key milestone in the pipeline company's efforts to clinch a friendly deal with its peer.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Exclusive: Energy Transfer advances in auction for Williams - sources

content: July 8 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Wednesday:
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: July 8 Pipeline company Energy Transfer Equity LP said it planned to proceed with its proposal to buy rival Williams Companies Inc despite being rebuffed  indicating it may go hostile with the offer.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: ETE says to proceed with Williams offer despite rejection

content: HOUSTON  June 23 Williams Companies Inc  has spurned Energy Transfer Equity's $48 billion takeover offer for now but a tie-up would give the company a dominant position in the fastest-growing natural gas market in the United States: the Northeast's Marcellus Shale.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Williams deal would hasten Energy Transfer's Marcellus dominance

content: HOUSTON  June 22 Energy Transfer Equity's  unsolicited $48 billion offer for Williams Companies Inc  through a corporate structure with tax advantages may be the U.S. pipeline company's best option as potential bids from rivals are complicated by possible antitrust issues and the deal's rich price  investors and analysts said on Monday.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Energy Transfer offer may be Williams' best option -analysts

content: * Greece deal optimism lifts sentiment  Nasdaq hits new record
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: US STOCKS-Wall St rises on Greece optimism  Nasdaq ends at record

content: June 22 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Monday:
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Energy Transfer Equity LP confirmed it had made a $48 billion unsolicited bid for natural gas pipeline company Williams Companies Inc  hours after Williams rejected the offer as significantly too low.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: ETE confirms $48 billion bid for reluctant Williams Co

content: June 22 The following are the top stories in the Wall Street Journal. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: PRESS DIGEST- Wall Street Journal - June 22

content: June 22 Energy Transfer Equity LP  confirmed it had made a $48 billion unsolicited bid for natural gas pipeline company Williams Companies Inc  hours after Williams rejected the offer as significantly too low.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: UPDATE 1-ETE confirms $48 bln bid for reluctant Williams Co

content: June 22 Energy Transfer Equity LP  a portfolio company that owns energy assets  said it has made an all-equity offer of $53.1 billion  including debt  to merge with Williams Companies Inc.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: Energy Transfer Equity confirms bid for Williams Co

content: June 21 Natural gas pipeline company Williams Companies Inc said on Sunday it is exploring strategic options after it received an unsolicited takeover proposal for $64 per share or $48 billion.
name: Energy Transfer Equity LP
title: UPDATE 2-Williams Co rejects $48 bln unsolicited offer
